Control Name: 6.13 Ensure that Cloud SQL database instances are not open to the world
Control Statement: Database Server should accept connections only from trusted Network(s)/IP(s) and restrict access from the world.

control_attributes.Control: 6.13 Ensure that Cloud SQL database instances are not open to the world
